statements: SELECT * FROM collaborations
SELECT collaboration_id, content_id FROM collaborations WHERE partner_id = 101
SELECT * FROM collaborations WHERE content_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT collaboration_id, partner_id FROM collaborations ORDER BY collaboration_date DESC
SELECT MAX(collaboration_id) FROM collaborations
SELECT collaboration_id, partner_id, content_id, collaboration_type, collaboration_date FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_type = 'Offer' ORDER BY collaboration_date DESC
SELECT * FROM collaborations WHERE partner_id = 123 AND collaboration_type = 'Share' ORDER BY collaboration_id ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_collaborations FROM collaborations WHERE content_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
SELECT collaboration_id, content_id, collaboration_date FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_date >= '2022-01-01' AND collaboration_type LIKE '%Campaign%' ORDER BY collaboration_id DESC
SELECT collaboration_id, partner_id, content_id, collaboration_type FROM collaborations WHERE partner_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY content_id ASC
SELECT * FROM ContentCollaborations;
SELECT collaboration_name, collaboration_description FROM ContentCollaborations;
SELECT collaboration_name, partner_id FROM ContentCollaborations WHERE collaboration_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Partners WHERE partnership_type = 'sponsorship';
SELECT partner_name, partnership_start_date FROM Partners WHERE partnership_end_date > CURDATE();

SELECT partner_name, partnership_type, partnership_start_date, partnership_end_date FROM Partners;
SELECT * FROM ContentCollaborations WHERE collaboration_id = 1;
SELECT partner_name, partnership_type FROM Partners WHERE partnership_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT collaboration_id, collaboration_name, partner_name FROM ContentCollaborations INNER JOIN Partners ON ContentCollaborations.partner_id = Partners.partner_id;
SELECT collaboration_name, collaborators FROM collaborations;
SELECT partnership_name, partner, start_date, end_date FROM partnerships;
SELECT content_title, sponsor, publish_date, content_type FROM sponsored_content;

SELECT content_title, sponsor, publish_date FROM sponsored_content WHERE content_type = 'Ad';
SELECT collaboration_name, collaborators FROM collaborations ORDER BY collaboration_id DESC;
SELECT partnership_name, start_date FROM partnerships WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM collaborations;
SELECT collaboration_name, start_date, end_date FROM collaborations;
SELECT * FROM partners WHERE industry = 'Technology';

SELECT content_title, content_type FROM sponsored_content WHERE partner_id = '12345';
SELECT collaboration_name, partner_name, start_date, end_date FROM collaborations JOIN partners ON collaborations.partner_id = partners.partner_id;

SELECT partner_name, partner_type FROM partners ORDER BY partner_type ASC

SELECT collaboration_name, partner_name, partnership_date FROM collaboration_partners INNER JOIN partners ON collaboration_partners.partner_id = partners.partner_id INNER JOIN content_collaborations ON collaboration_partners.collaboration_id = content_collaborations.collaboration_id
SELECT content_title, sponsorship_amount FROM sponsored_content WHERE sponsorship_id IN (SELECT sponsorship_id FROM sponsorships WHERE sponsorship_amount > 1000)
